What is Humaucracy?

Humaucracy exists solely to promote the health, wealth & well being of each & every individual across their lifespans. Its mission is dedicated to strengthening the local communities we all live in.


Humaucracy was built to be different from previous health care models in 3 important ways: our focus on the Individual, our Community-based approach, and our Proactive model of health care.

Individually Focused

Humaucracy recognizes the variety of influences on your health. We thus focus on the whole person, by addressing 9 areas that can affect your health.

• You • Community • Health
• Money • Stress/Illness • Diet
• Emotion • Sex • Cognition

Our broader perspective may show an improvement to individuals using many current, narrower primary care models.

Community Based

Humaucracy seeks to strengthen the health of people by strengthening health of communities.

• We come to you
• Community involvement
• Interest in your own relationships from a health care perspective

Humaucracy replaces your existing primary care doctor and includes more innovation & effective services. Humaucracy visits are available in person, at home & telemedicine

Proactive Primary Care

Whereas current systems generally interact with you when you are sick, Humaucracy seeks to interact with you when you are well.

• Proactive - we will enhance your current health to keep away disease in the future.
• Primary - early intervention 'an ounce of prevention equals a pound of cure'
• Care - when you are sick, we save you a Doctors visit by coming to you.

The Humaucracy Care System

We offer to you, the Humaucracy Care System (HCS), a shared comprehensive, straightfoward dynamic framework for your healthlife. HCS is unrivalled as the first 21st century, goal based, process driven life affirming health innovation that provides a clear, collaborative road map to fully optimize the health, wealth & well being of every participating individual member.

How Humaucracy Helps You Get Healthy?

Humaucracy offers you a caring, dedicated professional primary care provider whose job is to be your health guide, support & advocate. We actively listen and work for you with one sole focus: to optimize your health. Simply, your success is Humaucracy's reward.

Personalize Your Plan & Establish Your Goals

Your dedicated Humaucracy health professional will help you develop your personalized health plan using the Humaucracy Care System. Together, the focused goals and active processes will be created to put your health plan into action.

Feel Improvements & Monitor Your Health

Your dedicated Humaucracy health professional will monitor and make the modifications to ensure your progress towards success. The HCS will give you the tools, the support and the confidence to bring the healthy you fully to life!
Humaucracy Membership

Proactive Care for One Flat Fee.

Humaucracy memberships are $99/month. This one flat monthly fee gives you unlimited access to Humaucracy Providers and services. Humaucracy will never charge you a copay or send you an unexpected bill. Humaucracy visits are available in person, at home & remote.

What's Included?
$99/month
  • Prescription Delivery
  • Lab Testing
  • Mental Health Support
  • Sports Physicals
  • Weight Loss Exercise Plans
  • Telemedicine
  • 24/7 Messaging
Find out more about becoming a member!
Customized

Need a customized plan? Contact us directly and we can work with you to craft a plan that fits your company's specific needs.
